    • git常用命令

# 使用ssh-keygen

Command line instructions

# Git global setup

git config --global user.name "username"
git config --global user.email "lanianer@qq.com"

# …or create a new repository on the command line

echo "# pas" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git remote add origin https://github.com/HaoChunYang/pas.git
git push -u origin master

# …or push an existing repository from the command line

git remote add origin https://github.com/HaoChunYang/pas.git
git push -u origin master

# 常用git命令

git tag

git tag v1.0.1

git push origin v1.0.1

git tag -d v1.0.1

git push origin :refs/tags/v1.0.1 //删除远程tag

git push origin dev //将分支推送到远端

git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/dev //关联

git branch -a //查看本地和远程的所有分支 git branch -r //查看远程分支

git fetch //将远程分支与本地分支保持同步 git checkout -b 本地分支名x origin/远程分支名x //拉取远程分支并创建对应的本地分支

# eg: git 从远程仓库获取所有分支

  1. 首先同步所有远程分支，如下：
git branch -r | grep -v '\->' | while read remote; do git branch --track "${remote#origin/}" "$remote"; done

  1. 将本地所有分支与远程保持同步 git fetch --all

  2. 最后拉取所有分支代码 git pull --all

git常用命令 →
